channel.title: Public static boolean IsDropping = false;
channel.description:
Hello, i have been trying to add a Mod Zone....
I have added these Npc's:
[code]spawn = 98 3214 3468 1 3288 3163 3286 3164 1 Dog -MZ spawn = 98 3211 3168 1 3288 3163 3286 3164 1 Dog -MZ spawn = 550 3214 3464 0 0 0 0 0 1 range shop -MZ spawn = 209 3214 3463 0 0 0 0 0 2 dragon shop spawn = 520 3211 3464 0 0 0 0 0 1 Member Shop spawn = 555 3211 3463 0 0 0 0 0 1 Skill Cape Shop spawn = 561 3211 3262 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hood Shop spawn = 1699 3214 3262 0 0 0 0 0 1 Pure Shop[/code]
I hav just noticed that there are squares in the code above... ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ And these Objects (Banks so you cant escape! mwuahahhaa!)
[code]makeGlobalObject(3213, 3439, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3212, 3439, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3464, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3465, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3466, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3467, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank [/code]
And i have made the Npc Dog (Id = 98)
And here is the Code for it
[code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 98) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Mod Zone,
Rawr."; } }[/code]
Please help!
PS, i am not giving out a tutorial!
Please dont say that i am...

item.title: Public static boolean IsDropping = false;
item.dc:creator: @iamthebest456 iamthebest456
item.description:
@iamthebest456 wrote:

Here is the error:

NPCHandler.java:1036: illegal start of expression
public static boolean IsDropping = false;
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:
@iamthebest456 wrote:

Hello, i have been trying to add a Mod Zone…

I have added these Npc’s:

spawn = 98 3214 3468 1 3288 3163 3286 3164 1 Dog -MZ spawn = 98 3211 3168 1 3288 3163 3286 3164 1 Dog -MZ spawn = 550 3214 3464 0 0 0 0 0 1 range shop -MZ spawn = 209 3214 3463 0 0 0 0 0 2 dragon shop spawn = 520 3211 3464 0 0 0 0 0 1 Member Shop spawn = 555 3211 3463 0 0 0 0 0 1 Skill Cape Shop spawn = 561 3211 3262 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hood Shop spawn = 1699 3214 3262 0 0 0 0 0 1 Pure Shop

I hav just noticed that there are squares in the code above…

And these Objects (Banks so you cant escape! mwuahahhaa!)

makeGlobalObject(3213, 3439, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3212, 3439, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3464, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3465, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3466, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank makeGlobalObject(3234, 3467, 8481, -2, 10); // Blocking Bank

And here is the Code for it

[code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 98) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;

}[/code]
